1eefde366bd2d5f4.command: tar -cf archive.tar deep/path/file.txt && mkdir out && tar -xf archive.tar -C out --strip-components=2 && cat out/file.txt

2ba72b80d7e2315e.command: tar -cf archive.tar mydir && rm -rf mydir && tar -xf archive.tar && cat mydir/nested.txt

53ef5bd7218ab0f6.command: tar -czf archive.tar.gz compress.txt && rm compress.txt && tar -xzf archive.tar.gz && cat compress.txt

87cc3d174c5bf2cd.command: tar -cf archive.tar source.txt && mkdir dest && tar -xf archive.tar -C dest && cat dest/source.txt

c0f8ce57cb363e70.command: tar -cf archive.tar mydir && tar -tf archive.tar | sort

cdaa68944a83396b.command: tar -cf archive.tar original.txt && rm original.txt && tar -xf archive.tar && cat original.txt

ea3d17f6c34f860d.command: tar -cf archive.tar file1.txt file2.txt && tar -tf archive.tar | sort
